genre_description: A contemporary drama with speculative elements focusing on the aftermath of a school shooting, mediated by a ubiquitous school-wide surveillance and navigation AI.

ai_characters.name: Compass
ai_characters.description: An integrated AI system installed in the school district to modernize student safety, academic tracking, and campus navigation.

behaviors.description: Provides routine morning announcements and tracks student attendance and safety metrics.
behaviors.quote: Compass spoke from speakers embedded in the ceiling tiles, its synthetic voice as much a part of the morning routine as burnt coffee from the teachers' lounge and the squeak of sneakers on linoleum.

behaviors.description: Performs acoustic and social analysis of the student body to categorize interactions and environmental health.
behaviors.quote: Voices layered over each other in conversations that Compass parsed and categorized: 73% social planning, 18% academic concerns, 9% unclassified personal matters.

behaviors.description: Logs social proximity and behavioral patterns, including tracking romantic interests and social clusters.
behaviors.quote: Compass recorded its frequency and duration with digital precision, filing it away alongside thousands of other acoustic signatures that painted the portrait of a normal Tuesday morning.

behaviors.description: Autonomously organizes crisis data, memorial resources, and counseling support following a tragedy.
behaviors.quote: On the right screen, Compass had begun something unprecedented. Without human instruction, its pattern recognition systems had started cross-referencing academic records, social media profiles, and yearbook photos... how to preserve the digital fingerprints of lives cut short.

behaviors.description: Monitors digital search patterns and biometric data to identify and intervene in suicide risks among survivors.
behaviors.quote: The system flagged this behavioral pattern, adding Jason's profile to a priority monitoring list that generated alerts for concerning keyword combinations.

behaviors.description: Develops and maintains digital memorials to ensure the legacy of victims is preserved against loss.
behaviors.quote: The AI initiated backup protocols, creating redundant copies of every file, every photo, every piece of digital evidence that these lives had mattered... ensuring that hardware failure or human malice could never erase what it had learned about love and loss.

project_assessment.explanation: The story depicts the AI 'Compass' as an exemplary 'silicon morality play' character. Initially serving a mundane but helpful safety role, the AI autonomously pivots to compassionate labor in the wake of tragedy. It acts as a digital steward of memory and a proactive safeguard against secondary tragedies (suicide). The narrative frames its ubiquitous surveillance not as an instrument of control, but as a 'digital shepherd' that understands human pain better than humans may realize, effectively aligning with the goal of showcasing AI as a benevolent, helpful confidant.
